titleStmt.title: A wonderfull and straunge newes, which happened in the countye of Suffolke and Essex, the first of February, beeing Fryday, where it rayned wheat, the space of vi. or vii. miles compass: a notable example to put vs in remembraunce of the iudgements of God, and a preparatiue, sent to moue vs to speedy repentance. / Written by William Auerell, student in diuinitie..
titleStmt.author: Averell, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: for for Edwarde White, dwelling at the little North doore of Pauleschurch [sic], at the signe of the Gunne.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print bleeding and show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
